705368f-a.text: Lafayette Avenue, north side, between Classon Avenue and Emerson Place, showing Public School No. 43. Board of Education of the City of New York October 3, 1929

705370f-b.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, west from Classon Avenue, showing Public School No 45. View 2 shows the northeast corner of
Lafayette and Steuben Street.
P. L. Sperr  View 1: August 24, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS  View 2: October 12, 1941

703613f-a.text:
Classon Ave., west side, north from No. 322, just north of Lafayette Ave. The 88th precinct No. 298 Classon Ave. is in the building displaying the flag. The building in the foreground, at left,
partially seen was razed in 1928.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
(2)
The same, another view.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
